question: Please advise if it is permissible to eat shark meat for Hanafis and Shafis...
answer:
QUESTION

 

Please advise if it is permissible to eat shark meat for Hanafis and Shafis 

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful  

Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh  

 

According to the Hanafi Mazhab, it is only permissible to consume from the ocean that which is classified as a fish, irrespective of what it feeds on. All other aquatic creatures which are not classified as fish will be considered Haraam.

(Hidayah, vol.4, pg.442, Shika)[1]
(Fatawa Hindiyya, vol.5, pg.289, Rashidiyya)[2]
(Ad Durrul Mukhtaar, vol.6, pg.306, HM Saeed)

Allamah Damiri (Rahimahullah) has classified sharks as fish.

(Hayatul Hayawan, vol.2, pg.708, Darul Fikr)

The characteristics of a fish are found in the shark. Hence, it will be permissible for a Hanafi to eat shark meat as well as the by-products of sharks.

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best

 

Checked and Approved by:

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Dārul Iftā

[1] ولا يؤكل من حيوان الماء إلا السمك (فصل فيما يحل أكله وما لا يحل)

[2] فجميع ما في البحر من الحيوان يحرم أكله إلا السمك خاصة فإنه يحل أكله إلا ما طفا منه (الباب الثاني في بيان ما يؤكل من الحيوان وما لا يؤكل)
